articles.description: France's Leon Marchand sends an ear-splitting La Defense Arena into raptures by winning the 200m butterfly title and maintaining his bid for four Olympic golds at his home Games.
articles.title: Olympic swimming: France's Leon Marchand wins second gold in Paris

articles.description: Great Britain's Beth Potter wins Olympic triathlon bronze after the race is cleared to go ahead at Paris 2024 following days of uncertainty over the water quality in the River Seine.
articles.title: Olympic triathlon: Great Britain's Beth Potter wins bronze at Paris 2024

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Brazil great Marta goes off in tears after being shown a red card against Spain at the Olympic women's football tournament.
articles.title: Olympic women's football: Marta goes off in tears after red card

articles.description: Team GB's rowers win gold in the women's quadruple sculls after the men finish fourth.
articles.title: Team GB rowers win gold in women's quadruple sculls after men finish fourth

articles.description: Australia's Jessica Fox wins her second Olympic canoeing gold medal at Paris 2024 to make history.
articles.title: Jessica Fox: Australian wins second Olympic canoeing gold to make history in Paris

articles.description: Former England manager Steve McClaren is named Jamaica head coach on a two-year contract.
articles.title: Steve McClaren: Jamaica name former England boss as head coach

articles.description: The USA cruise to a 103-86 victory over South Sudan to qualify for the Olympic men's basketball quarter-finals.
articles.title: Olympics basketball: USA beat South Sudan to make quarter-finals

articles.description: Chelsea accept a bid from Atletico Madrid for midfielder Conor Gallagher.
articles.title: Conor Gallagher: Chelsea accept Atletico Madrid's offer midfielder
